body.name: TCL 32-Inch Class S3 1080p LED Smart TV with Google TV (32S350G, 2023 Model), Google Assistant Built-in with Voice Remote, Compatible with Alexa, Streaming FHD Television,Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 47 mins

features: 1080P Full HD Resolution: experience your favorite movies and TV shows in stunning high-definition picture quality for enhanced clarity and detail.
HDR (HDR10, & HLG): Enjoy enhanced contrast, accurate colors and fine details utilizing all the most advanced HDR formats.
Google TV Smart OS : The entertainment you love. Google TV brings your favorite movies, shows, and live shows together.
FullView Metal Bezel-less Design: Elegant edge-to-edge glass design for a modern design that blends seamlessly into any home.
Bluetooth Personal Audio: Pair your favorite Bluetooth headphones to the TV for a private listening experience.
2 HDMI Inputs (One with ARC): Two high-speed HDMI inputs for the best connection to gaming consoles, set-top boxes, AV receiver and more.
Chromecast Built-in: Works with the streaming apps you know and love: Enjoy TV shows, movies, videos, songs, games, sports and more from thousands of apps.
Works with: Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant – Use your voice to control your TV using the most popular voice assistants.
body.description: Step-up to 1080p Full HD Resolution with HDR (HDR10 & HLG) and Bluetooth Personal Audio, for an amazing small to mid-size TV that can also double as your PC Monitor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our old TV broke. This TV is great quality and great picture resolution. We received it in a timely manner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely worth the money
reviews.reviewText: This TV takes a small amount of fiddling with the picture settings. When done, it's a great picture in all respects and the sensitivity of the TV to weak signals is remarkable.The interface to the Internet is flawless and an extrodinary number of "channels" are available.This is a remarkably good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great picture, easy setup
reviews.reviewText: Great TV for the price. This is my second one, colors are real good. Highly recommend. I have 2 minor complaints as follows, awkward mount for wall on back and connections on one side instead of top or bottom. There is a bizarre light on the bottom that comes on when tv is off, should be the other way around. My problem is it’s in bedroom and light is very bright in the dark. Unable too find a way to turn it off as I sleep lightly. Why it’s even there is weird. Otherwise a nice TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well for the price and does everything I need.
reviews.reviewText: Picture quality is pretty good. The operating system can occasionally lag a second, but nothing annoying. One reviewer stated they were annoyed by the light on the bottom that comes on when the TV is off. Yes, that is counterintuitive, but it can be turned off in the settings menu. Google TV has a lot of stuff that's free, but I'm addicted to my favorite streaming platforms for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is not a TV.
reviews.reviewText: This device asked me to set up Google Home on my Android phone and from there it got worse. There are absolutely no setup directions, the print on the remote is tiny (and it has no numbers for selecting channels) Then it said I had to couple the "TV" with my Wi-Fi. It didn't work. When I finally figured out how to make it work without all that fuss, it still was very difficult, again because there were no instuctions. Then after I got it set up, it turned out that it was just a shill for Googles streaming resources, with an 800 item guide in very small print that had all of the "free" places you could go and buy various movies, etc. it seems like a scam to me, pure and simple. If you want a Google streaming menu with seveeral TV channels thrown in, apparently at random, buy it. If you want a TV where you can make your own choices of channels, i would stay away from this gimmicky contender.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love this TV. I think this is the fourth one I have bought over several years now I have one and I think almost almost every room but the bathroom I have no problems getting what I want on there my subscriptions all work on there so it turned out to be a great deal, I would buy it again if any of my TVs went out right now I don’t need anymore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent picture and beautiful colors.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am so amazed at the colors in this tv. I have over ten TV’s and this tv has a better picture than some of my more expensive TV’s . I actually placed it side by side for a comparison to a much higher price tv and this tv blew the other tv away. It boots up pretty fast and the apps are easy to navigate through. The remote works flawlessly and I love the voice control. An added bonus is the Alexa feature. I use a streaming service and my WiFi isn’t the best and I still rate this tv better than my more expensive TV’s. I’ve yet to see any buffering while some of my other TV’s buffer quite often. I could get into the specs but I don’t want to bore anyone with that much info. I will say that most of my TV’s are LED and again, the color and picture quality are way better. I’ll be replacing my other TV’s with TCL brand as they quit working. The video cannot show the quality of the color as I see it in real life. And the boot time will be better depending on the speed of your WiFi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I hate this TV
reviews.reviewText: It was a great price, and I have three other TCL TV's, what I didn't realize was, that there is a difference between Google TV and Roku TV and I can't find Discovery + on the Google TV, this is my favorite app, which makes the TV useless for me. What a waste of my money.
La imagen muy bien y el sonido también, debo aceptar que me sorprendió muy gratamente la marca

Buena Relación de Precio, Tamaño y Calidad de Imagen. Mayormente lo uso como Monitor, aun asi estoy satisfecho con el Producto. No me agrada mucho el Control Remoto, aun No me acomodo mucho con el Principalmente a la Hora de cambiar el Volumen, pero supongo que puedo comprar mas adelante otro Universal. En General 9/10 de esta TV.

Esta muy buena, imagen y sonido decente, había tenido una jvc con Roku y puedo ver la diferencia de imagen gracias al HDR, el sonido también se escucha fuerte, nada espectacular, cumple con su función, el único pero que le pongo es que supuestamente es sin biseles y efectivamente físicamente no trae bordes pero al encenderla se le hacen líneas negras de aproximadamente 1 CM por todo el cuadro de la pantalla y da la impresión que tiene marco y pues no afecta en nada pero es publicidad engañosa en cuanto a eso y para mí gusto le quita ese toque moderno que debería tener, no se pueden quitar esas líneas mediante configuración, la pantalla así está hecha y pues ni modoLa Roku que tenía esa si es totalmente sin biseles y se veía muy bonita la imagen a pantalla completa, pero en fin, cada marca trae sus pro y sus contraPor cierto al traer sistema android pensé que podría instalarle izzi go para ver los canales pero primeramente no está en la playstore y segundo trate de instalarlo por medio de apk y oh sorpresa, me dice que la app solo es para dispositivos táctiles y no me dejó ver nada, y así con varias app que pensé podría instalarle como la de TV Azteca, Milenio, ADN 40, etc pero no están disponibles, en fin el android es muy limitado y en cuanto al sistema Google tv te recomienda cosas de servicios a los que no estás suscrito (solo tengo Netflix y claro video) y es molesto estar viendo esa publicidadTubi, Pluto y Canela TV si están disponibles (sería el colmo si no)Por cierto cuando la prendí, puse películas, musica, etc y a la media hora se apagó sola, pensé que saldría defectuosa pero por ahora todo bien, ya no se apagó, a ver qué tal me va, llevo una semana de uso

reviews.reviewerName: Excelente tiempo de llegada , Amazon me decía que llegaba el 8 de febrero y llego el 31 de enero ! Las especificaciones del Producto tal cual en las descripciones. Producto llegó en excelente condición sin golpes ni rayones . La calidad de la imagen me dejo sorprendido y él interfaz tan fluido me dejo un muy buen sabor de boca . Excelente servicio! reviews.reviewText: La smart Tv perfecta para mi consola de videojuegos. Dado el hecho que la consola no da un rendimiento con un monitor con más Hz. La play me corre a 1080 y está Perfecto por qué la TV es full HD ósea 1080 y va muy acorde a las especificaciones de video de la consola!
